name: Slide to finish
description: Slide to finish is a line rider type of a game which has cute style and animations. You have to reach a certain point and collect as many carrots as possible. To do that you need figure out how to draw a road and use special objects like fans and springs so a sled with a bear and rabbits be able to slide down to a flag and avoid traps. Each location add more stuff that make solving harder. You also can design your own levels or solve levels designed by other players.
